definition.name: Tooltip
definition.purpose: Display contextual information when users hover or focus on an element
definition.description: A reusable tooltip component that wraps its children and shows a tooltip on hover or focus. It uses Radix UI's Tooltip primitives and provides a consistent style and animation.

initial.data: No tooltip is visible. The trigger element is rendered.

when.description: User hovers or focuses on the trigger element

effects: Tooltip content is displayed near the trigger element

when.description: User moves mouse away or blurs the trigger element

definition.visualLayout: The trigger element is wrapped, and the tooltip content appears above, below, left, or right of the trigger with animation.
definition.implementationNotes: Composes TooltipProvider and TooltipPrimitive.Root. All props are passed to the underlying Radix Tooltip Root.

definition.name: TooltipContent
definition.purpose: Render the content of a tooltip with custom styling and animation
definition.description: A reusable component for the content of a tooltip, providing custom styles, animation, and an arrow. It is rendered inside a portal and composes Radix UI's Tooltip.Content.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the tooltip content

sideOffset.description: Offset distance from the trigger element

initial.data: Tooltip content is not rendered until triggered.

effects: Tooltip content and arrow are rendered in a portal with animation

definition.visualLayout: Tooltip content appears in a floating layer with rounded corners, background color, and an arrow pointing to the trigger.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses Radix Tooltip.Portal and Tooltip.Content. Applies custom classes and supports sideOffset and className props.

definition.name: TooltipProvider
definition.purpose: Provide context for tooltip components and manage delay duration
definition.description: A provider component for tooltips that sets up context and manages delay duration for showing tooltips. Wraps Radix UI's Tooltip.Provider.

delayDuration.description: Delay in milliseconds before showing the tooltip

initial.data: Tooltip context is provided to all children.

effects: All nested tooltips receive context and delay configuration

definition.visualLayout: Wraps children in a context provider for tooltips.
definition.implementationNotes: Passes delayDuration and other props to Radix Tooltip.Provider.

definition.name: TooltipTrigger
definition.purpose: Designate an element as the trigger for a tooltip
definition.description: A reusable component that marks its child as the trigger for a tooltip. Composes Radix UI's Tooltip.Trigger and adds a data attribute for styling or testing.

initial.data: Trigger element is rendered and ready to activate tooltip.

when.description: User hovers or focuses the trigger

definition.visualLayout: Renders the trigger element, which can be any React node.
definition.implementationNotes: All props are passed to Radix Tooltip.Trigger. Adds data-slot attribute for targeting.
